sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OLD Technical Services">3a6c66681b0c01905b1b411acd4bcb88</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6d29894b1bc48d905b1b411acd4bcbb1</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Tech.intervention - onChange</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	if (newValue == 'No') {
		//show fields
		g_form.setVisible('software', true);
		g_form.setVisible('software_version', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('software', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('software_version', true);
		g_form.setVisible('failure_code', true);
		g_form.setVisible('failure_description', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('failure_description', true);

		//hide fields (reverse selection)

		//       
		//         g_form.setMandatory('safety_related_issue', false);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('failure_rate', false);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('failure_cost', false);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('escalation_level', false);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('d_identification', false);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('d_link_url', false);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('responsibility_reason_code', false);

		g_form.setVisible('location', false);
		g_form.setVisible('tools_on_site', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('safety_related_issue', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('failure_rate', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('failure_cost', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('escalation_level', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('d_identification', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('d_link_url', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('service_information_link', false);
		//         g_form.setVisible('responsibility_reason_code', false);	
	}

	if (newValue == 'Yes') {
		//show fields
		g_form.setVisible('location', true);
		g_form.setVisible('tools_on_site', true);
		g_form.setVisible('failure_code', true);
		g_form.setVisible('failure_description', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('safety_related_issue', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('failure_rate', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('failure_cost', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('escalation_level', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('d_identification', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('d_link_url', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('service_information_link', true);
		//         g_form.setVisible('responsibility_reason_code', true);

		g_form.setMandatory('failure_description', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('tools_on_site', true);

		//         g_form.setMandatory('safety_related_issue', true);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('failure_rate', true);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('failure_cost', true);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('escalation_level', true);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('d_identification', true);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('d_link_url', true);
		//         g_form.setMandatory('responsibility_reason_code', true);

		//hide fields (reverse selection)
		g_form.setMandatory('software', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('software_version', false);

		g_form.setVisible('software', false);
		g_form.setVisible('software_version', false);

	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>anis.bekdash@doitwise.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 15:59:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>385c3cad1b0c45905b1b411acd4bcb16</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Tech.intervention - onChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_385c3cad1b0c45905b1b411acd4bcb16</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kristian.teodorov@doitwise.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-23 08:40:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
